items.description: A stack-based 2d language with support for reflection.
A surprisingly user-friendly language with a highly-limited instruction set.
A single-character command language focused around the numbers 7 and 8.
Language defined completely in JSON.

items.description: Code in binary and run on any platform.

items.description: Based on the best one-liners of Arnold Schwarzenegger.

items.description: Language made of brackets, a lot of brackets.

items.description: Minimalist language using only 8 single-character commands.

items.description: Musical language focused on sound rather than notation with creative freedom in mind.
items.title: C Flat

items.description: A 1d celular automata based language, supports a complex pattern matching syntax.

items.description: Concise language for sketching ASCII art.

items.description: Programs that look like cooking recipes.
items.title: Chef

items.description: Only 1 valid symbol: 'chicken'.
items.title: Chicken

items.description: Unary-based language, where the code is a single number.

items.description: Brainfuck variant using twelve variations of  as instructions.

items.description: A turing-complete language using "." symbol only.

items.description: Code like an electrician.
items.title: Electra

items.description: Full-blown programming language consisting of emojis.

items.description: Non deterministic unnecessarily statically typed language.
items.title: Enterprise™

items.description: Heavily obfuscated language with a minimal implementation.
items.title: False

items.description: Designed such that source code looks like poorly written fetish erotica.
items.title: Fetlang

items.description: 1 instruction: Flip a bit, then Jump. The simplest OISC.

items.description: Code written with folders.
items.title: Folders

items.description: Full-blown programming language with NSFW contents and memes.

items.description: Music as source code.

items.description: Stack oriented, aimed at solving problems in as few keystrokes as possible.

items.description: Designed with the core values of Eastern philosophy in mind.

items.description: Parody language intended to be completely different from other languages.

items.description: Reduced JavaScript for golfing.
items.title: Japt

items.description: Golfing language based on J.
items.title: Jelly

items.description: Brainfuck-based with delicious jelly.
items.title: JellyScript

items.description: Esoteric programming style based on the atomic parts of JavaScript.
items.title: JSFuck

items.description: Minimal, turing-complete pure functional language without extra features.
items.title: Lazy K

items.description: Programs defined entirely by the graph of the git repository instead of its contents.
items.title: legit

items.description: Language with keywords based on the lolcat meme expressions.
items.title: LolCode

items.description: Named after the 8th level of hell, is designed to be as difficult as possible to program.
items.title: Malbolge

items.description: High level language that transpiles to Brainfuck.
items.title: Mindfck

items.description: Programming using Italian-like gibberish.

items.description: Brainfuck-based with more helpful instructions.

items.description: Syntax resembling Internet slang.
items.title: Omgrofl

items.description: Brainfuck-based language, where the commands are orangutan words.
items.title: Ook!

items.description: Livecoding environment to quickly create procedural audio sequencers.
items.title: Orca

items.description: Language in which programs look like abstract paintings using colors as code. Named after Piet Mondrian.
items.title: Piet

items.description: Fungeoid with no limits on program space, float precision, and with a bit of random access to stack.
items.title: RASEL

items.description: Morse-styled language.
items.title: reMorse

items.description: Designed for creating computer programs that are also song lyrics.
items.title: Rockstar

items.description: Language where the code appear to be Shakespearean plays.
items.title: Shakespeare

items.description: The MIDI Esoteric Programming Language.
items.title: Schoenberg

items.description: The scariest programming language  :jack_o_lantern: :skull:.
items.title: Spooky

items.description: 3D language inspired in Befunge.
items.title: Suzy

items.description: Language in which programs look like the lyrics to the Daft Punk song Technologic.
items.title: Technologic

items.description: language based on nondeterministic string rewriting of a semi-Thue grammar.
items.title: Thue

items.description: A stack-based language with prefix-free brackets.
items.title: Tru

items.description: Uses long-term storage for memory use.
items.title: Turtle

items.description: Brainfuck-based language where all the commands are 0.
items.title: Unary

items.description: Derivative of Unary in which every zero is replaced with the title of the programming language being discussed.
items.title: Unary Except Every Zero Is Replaced with the Title of This Programming Language or, Alternately, Is Replaced with the Smallest Counter-Example to the Goldbach Conjecture. Compilers and Interpreters Only Have to Implement the Former Option

items.description: Obfuscated functional programming.
items.title: Unlambda

items.description: Language that uses MIDI files as source, programs are defined by the pitch and order of notes.

items.description: Only Vigil is truly vigilant about not allowing code that fails to pass programmatic specifications.
items.title: Vigil

items.description: Stack-based Turing-incomplete configuration files.

items.description: Closely follows the grammar and tone of classical Chinese literature.

items.description: Language that does things whenever it wants.
items.title: Whenever

items.description: Use only white-characters (space, tabs and newlines).
items.title: Whitespace

items.description: A language based on meaning-like grammar that produces output.
items.title: WordLang

items.description: Use only the letter z.
items.title: Z

items.description: Inherently evil multithreaded language designed for Necromancers.
items.title: ZOMBIE

items.description: The only true brainfuck assembler toolkit.
